        Instantiates this book object passing the tag "#book" to the superconstructor
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this book
        genre - The genre of this book
        id - This book's ID
        copies - The number of copies of this book in inventory
        tags - Words associated with this book for searching
        author - The author of this book
        publisher - The book's publisher
        yearPublished - The year this book was published
